projects.title: TECHY STAR
projects.description: This is the first react project based on react-basics. In this I learn like how to create single page application by using reactJS.

projects.title: VIDEO HUB
projects.description: This is the second react project in this I use CSS frameworks like (ChakraUI) with the help of this we have a feature that we can view on dark mode and night mode.

projects.title: XCRYPTO
projects.description: This is the third react project based on Crypto currency. In this I uses an API which fetches the information about coins and I use ChartJS which is used to display the market chart of coin.

projects.title: REACT CART
projects.description: This is the fourth react project based on shopping-cart. In this I uses redux-tool-kit for state mangement and to create store. It was generally used in eccomerce application.

projects.title: PORTFOLIO
projects.description: This is fifth react-project it is personal-portfolio. In this I uses a firebase in contact form and the resultant data of the contact form will store in firebase.
